original_title: Passages from James Joyce's Finnegans Wake
overview: Based on the stage play Passages from Finnegans Wake, itself based on random passages from Finnegans Wake, Mary Ellen Bute's adaptation is a comical, avant-garde kaleidoscope about a man named Finnegan who dreams about his wake and then wakes up from his dream.
title: Passages from James Joyce's Finnegans Wake
